00053   chain::Real Vector2::MagnitudeSquared() const
00054   {
00055     return x*x+y*y;
00056   }
00057 
00058   chain::Real Vector2::Magnitude() const
00059   {
00060     return CH_SQRT(MagnitudeSquared());
00061   }

00063   const Vector2& Vector2::Normalise()
00064   {
00065     double tmp = x*x + y*y;
00066     if(tmp>0.0)
00067     {
00068       tmp = 1.0 / sqrt(tmp);
00069       x *= (Real)tmp;
00070       y *= (Real)tmp;
00071     }
00072     return *this;
00073   }
00074 
00075   const Vector2& Vector2::Scale( const Real s )
00076   {
00077     double tmp = x*x + y*y;
00078     if(tmp>0.0)
00079     {
00080       tmp = s / sqrt(tmp);
00081       x *= (Real)tmp;
00082       y *= (Real)tmp;
00083     }
00084     return *this;
00085   }
00086 
00087   const Vector2& Vector2::Truncate( const Real s )
00088   {
00089     double tmp = x*x + y*y;
00090     if(tmp > s*s)
00091     {
00092       tmp = s / sqrt(tmp);
00093       x *= (Real)tmp;
00094       y *= (Real)tmp;
00095     }
00096     return *this;
00097   }

00131   {

00185   bool Vector2::operator == (const Vector2& v) const
00186   {
00187     return FCOMPARE(x,v.x) && FCOMPARE(y,v.y);
00188   }
00189 
00190   bool Vector2::operator != (const Vector2& v) const
00191   {
00192     if( !FCOMPARE(x,v.x) || !FCOMPARE(y,v.y) )
00193       return true;
00194     return false;
00195   }
